articles.author: nelsonaloor
articles.title: How to Repair a Database in SQL Server Management Studio
articles.description:
As a SQL database administrator, it’s your responsibility to maintain and secure the databases. However, you may still experience database corruption. If not handled correctly and on time, you...
The post How to Repair a Database in SQL Server Management Stud…
articles.content:
Click New Query from the main menu. 
In the query window that opens, copy and paste the command below:
DBCC CHECKDB('DB_Name, REPAIR_ALLOW_DATA_LOSS | REPAIR_FAST | REPAIR_REBUILD) WITH ALL_ERRORMS… [+1744 chars]

articles.content: Skippy checks your screen for skip buttons and automatically clicks them for you. It skips ads, intros, recaps, polls, and more!It has built in support for English and Spanish, but it is easily confi… [+256 chars]
